oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 3, Program 11 (with Billy Walker)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 3, program 11 of a radio show hosted by Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys (including steel guitarist Lefty Nason) and featuring Billy Walker, to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials not included). Circa 1949-1950.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys; Billy Walker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- You Remembered Me (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Billy Walker talks -- Candy Kisses (Billy Walker) -- Hank Thompson and Billy Walker talk -- Fair Weather Baby (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Blue Bonnet Rag (Lefty Nason steel guitar) -- Hank Thompson talks -- You Broke My Heart (In Little Bitty Pieces) (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Brazos Valley Boys; Nason, Lefty
